items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty dress. Would purchase again.
items.body: purchased L. black as that was all that was left, knowing my hips, m wanted an XL but these were sold out. At 4â€™11â€ fits to my knees, fabric is medium weight, well made nice holiday dress weight, - would prob be careful in washing it - will be very pretty w open holiday vest (or without). Glad I got the L for my upper body - bottom can still be camaflaged. Very Pretty. Glad I got the black which was extra great for price reduction great value Read more
items.author: Catherine M.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Hebeld color block sweater dress
items.body: Very nice and classy outfit. Medium weight. I am 5â€™3â€ and 170lbs. Went XL black. Fits true to size. Has some stretch. Could have gone with a L for a more fitted look. Recommend it. Read more
items.author: Matlub A.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely
items.body: Beautiful and thick material perfect for winter. Read more
items.author: Ricki Vela

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars A good sweater dress for Fall/Winter
items.body: Cute sweater dress for fall or milder winter days, but it comes with a few issues. I got my usual size L & it fits true to size everywhere, but the neck- I found the neck to be incredibly tight- meaning I barely got it on & forcibly had to squeeze my head through. That said I made it & ended up trying to stretch the neck as much as possible. I ended up folding it over because it just looked odd to me being how tight it was. It was almost on the verge of being uncomfortable but after the modifications I made it through the day. Mine also looked like it had a stain down the front and back- itâ€™s very odd and faint & also looked like it could have been due to it being folded for shipping - but definitely noticeable on the light color & right in the center; Iâ€™m going to wash it and see if it goes away. This sweater dress is both comfy and good fit check. It is a soft, thinner, stretchy material- I preferred wearing a spanx with the lighter tan color since it does show every detail without a spanx. It pairs perfectly with my trench & booties or black tights and knee high boots, I originally wore with tights & tennis shoes. Overall such a good find at this price point even with the issues. One thing to note is that this could be on the shorter side for some I donâ€™t mind the length being 5â€™2â€ itâ€™s actually the perfect length (along the lines of a longer mini) and would say up to 5â€™6â€ it would fit about the same- otherwise if you are taller it may be too short for some peopleâ€™s liking- but worse case size up & give it a shot. Read more
items.author: swdrpsw

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It fits perfect (large)
items.body: I love it, the neck is a bit tight but after stretching it all day with my hands it loosened up ILOVE The look Read more

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Boxy fit
items.body: This is a quality sweater dress but the fit is very boxy. Ordered M as that was my suggested size but the fit was too loose. I had to return. Read more
items.author: Linda in Cleveland

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Wine Red, White, Beige, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
